version_description: In this version we have changed the user interface to make the application easier for everyone to use. We have changed the way the app shows the WodSpots, now you can see your current location WodSpots, this method makes the app faster and cleaner.

In this version we have changed the user interface to make the application easier for everyone to use. We have changed the way the app shows the WodSpots, now you can see your current location WodSpots, this method makes the app faster and cleaner. We have fixed a problem with devices running iOS12.
This new version brings 'CALCULATION' feature FREE for every user. Also fixes some bugs and stability improvements.

· FREE WodSpots access! Now you can see the full information of the WodSpot, passwords included.
· Current WiFi connection information banner has been removed temporally because it does not work properly.

· FREE WodSpots access! Now you can see the full information of the WodSpot, passwords included.
· Current WiFi connection information banner has been fixed and now it works properly.

· Added button to remove Ads. Now you can use the app without Ads if you want.
· FREE WodSpots access! Now you can see the full information of the WodSpot, passwords included.
· Current WiFi connection information banner has been fixed and now it works properly.
Bug fixes. We want to reward our users and we have blocked ads for this week.

We have made some fixes:
· Rendering problems for big screens like XS Max iPhones.
· Tap to copy has been fixed as well.
Improving app performance and fixed minor bugs.
Improving app performance and minor bugs fixed.
App improvements and dark mode UI.
Minor app updates, improvements and bug fixes.
